text: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
author: Victor Hugo

text: With what price we pay for the glory of motherhood.
author: Isadora Duncan

text: My mother is a walking miracle.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

text: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
author: Robert Browning

text: When my mother had to get dinner for 8 she'd just make enough for 16 and only serve half.
author: Gracie Allen

text: Who's a boy gonna talk to if not his mother?
author: Donald E. Westlake

text: The babe at first feeds upon the mother's bosom, but it is always on her heart.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

text: I got to grow up with a mother who taught me to believe in me.
author: Antonio Villaraigosa
